original_text: The Philistines heard the news that the Israelites had met together at Mizpah. So the Philistine rulers led their people to attack the Israelites. When the Israelites heard about this, they became very afraid of the Philistines.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 미스바에 모였다 함을 블레셋 사람들이 듣고 그들의 방백들이 이스라엘을 치러 올라온지라 이스라엘 자손들이 듣고 블레셋 사람들을 두려워하여

sentences.original_text: that the Israelites had met together at Mizpah
So the Philistine rulers led their people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 블레셋 지도자들은 자기 백성을 이끌고

sentences.original_text: When the Israelites heard about this
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 이 소식을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: they became very afraid of the Philistines
